Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Diablo in 1979...
Injured on 4/12/1979 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/31/1979 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Traded from Diablo to Boston (UBA) on 7/21/1981 (Going to DIA: 1B R. Dorn. Going to PIL: 3B S. Wesson, 1B E. Aguiar)...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to West Texas on 4/29/1982 (Going to PIL: 1B W. Boydston, P B. Chappel, LF J. Robinson. Going to WT: P T. George, LF D. Perdomo, 3B S. Wesson)...
Had first career hit on 5/22/1982, off Warner Cannaday (DIA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/23/1982, off Ruby Thomas (DIA)...
Injured on 4/25/1985 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Coney Island on 5/20/1989...
Hit for the cycle against Wisconsin on 6/3/1990...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 9/16/1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
